Title: Relates to court ordered forensic evaluations and reports in child custody and visitation proceedings
Summary: Relates to court ordered forensic evaluations and reports in child custody and visitation proceedings.
LawCode: Amd §§70 & 240, Dom Rel L; amd §§251 & 651, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the family court act, in relation to child custody forensic reports
